Author: jj
Comment: Regarding this check, it was and will actually never be true. We only reach this point when search_orientation == con_orientation(current->parent). The search_orientation is set depending on the value of the variable direction. Thus, this if clause tests whether search_orientation != con_orientation(current->parent).
